item.sql: INSERT INTO vedio_plan_patrol ( vpp_cus_number , vpp_id , vpp_frequenes , vpp_excute_time , vpp_name , vpp_creater , vpp_create_time )values( :cus , :vpp_id , :vpp_frequenes , :vpp_excute_time , :vpp_name , :vpp_creater , SYSDATE )
update vedio_plan_patrol set vpp_frequenes =:vpp_frequenes, vpp_excute_time =:vpp_excute_time, vpp_name =:vpp_name, vpp_updater =:vpp_updater, vpp_update_time =SYSDATE where vpp_id=:vpp_id
INSERT INTO vpp_user_link ( vul_cus_number , vul_user_id , vul_vpp_id , vul_id ) VALUES( :cus , :vul_user_id , :vul_vpp_id , :vul_id )
INSERT INTO vpp_camera_link ( vcl_cus_number , vcl_camera_id , vcl_vpp_id , vcl_id ) VALUES( :cus , :vcl_camera_id , :vcl_vpp_id , :vcl_id )
DELETE FROM vpp_user_link WHERE vul_vpp_id=:vpp_id AND vul_cus_number=:cus
DELETE FROM vpp_camera_link WHERE vcl_vpp_id=:vpp_id AND vcl_cus_number=:cus
DELETE FROM vedio_plan_patrol WHERE vpp_id=:vpp_id AND vpp_cus_number=:cus

SELECT vpp_id , vpp_frequenes , vpp_excute_time , vpp_name , (select WM_CONCAT(vul_user_id||'|'||ubd_name) FROM vpp_user_link JOIN sys_user_base_dtls ON vul_user_id=ubd_id WHERE vul_vpp_id=vpp_id)users, (select WM_CONCAT(vcl_camera_id||'|'||cbd_name) FROM vpp_camera_link JOIN cmr_camera_base_dtls ON vcl_camera_id=cbd_id WHERE vcl_vpp_id=vpp_id)cameras FROM vedio_plan_patrol WHERE vpp_cus_number=:cus

INSERT INTO vpp_check_record( vcr_cus_number , vcr_id , vcr_vpp_id , vcr_vpp_name , vcr_vpp_user , vcr_vpp_user_name , vcr_vpp_excute_time , vcr_vpp_real_time , vcr_vpp_camera , vcr_vpp_camera_name , vcr_status ) SELECT vcl_cus_number, NVL(( SELECT MAX(vcr_id) FROM vpp_check_record),1) +ROWNUM, vpp_id, vpp_name, vul_user_id, ubd_name , vpp_excute_time, TRUNC(SYSDATE,'dd'), vcl_camera_id, cbd_name , 0 FROM vedio_plan_patrol JOIN vpp_user_link ON vul_vpp_id = vpp_id JOIN vpp_camera_link ON vcl_vpp_id = vpp_id LEFT JOIN cmr_camera_base_dtls ON vcl_camera_id=cbd_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_base_dtls ON vul_user_id=ubd_id WHERE vcl_cus_number=:cus AND vpp_id=:planid

SELECT DISTINCT vcr_vpp_id, vcr_vpp_name, vcr_vpp_user, vcr_vpp_user_name, vcr_vpp_excute_time, cameras, SUBSTR(exc/max,0,3) precent, exc, max, mark FROM( SELECT DISTINCT vcr_vpp_id, vcr_vpp_name, vcr_vpp_user, vcr_vpp_user_name, vcr_vpp_excute_time, null cameras, COUNT(DECODE(vcr_status,1,vcr_vpp_id,NULL)) OVER( PARTITION BY vcr_vpp_id,vcr_vpp_excute_time, vcr_vpp_user ORDER BY vcr_vpp_id) exc, COUNT(vcr_vpp_id) OVER( PARTITION BY vcr_vpp_id,vcr_vpp_excute_time, vcr_vpp_user ORDER BY vcr_vpp_id) max, vcr_mark mark FROM vpp_check_record WHERE vcr_cus_number=:cus AND vcr_vpp_real_time=TO_DATE(:excutetime,'yyyy-mm-dd') )
WHERE (:userid is null OR vcr_vpp_user=:userid ) AND (:planName is null OR VCR_VPP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(:planName,'%')))
ORDER BY vcr_vpp_excute_time DESC
update vpp_check_record set vcr_status=1 where vcr_vpp_id=:planid AND vcr_vpp_user=:userid AND vcr_cus_number=:cus AND vcr_vpp_camera=:camera
SELECT vcr_vpp_camera_name name, vcr_status status, vcr_vpp_camera id FROM vpp_check_record WHERE vcr_vpp_id=:planid AND vcr_cus_number=:cus AND vcr_vpp_user=:user AND vcr_vpp_excute_time=:extime

WITH t AS( SELECT '1-'||odd_id id, '1-'||odd_parent_id pid, odd_name name, 'org.png' icon, 0 type, 'true' nocheck FROM sys_org_dept_dtls WHERE level # :level START WITH odd_parent_id=:org CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id ) SELECT id, pid, name, icon, type, nocheck FROM t UNION ALL SELECT ''||ubd_id id, '1-'||ubd_dept_id pid, ubd_name name, 'user.png' icon, 1 type, '' nocheck FROM sys_user_base_dtls INNER JOIN t ON '1-'||ubd_dept_id=t.id

SELECT vpp_id id, vpp_name name, vpp_excute_time, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(vul_user_id) FROM vpp_user_link INNER JOIN sys_user_base_dtls ON ubd_id=vul_user_id WHERE vul_vpp_id = vpp_id) users FROM VEDIO_PLAN_PATROL t WHERE vpp_id =:planid AND vpp_cus_number = :cus
SELECT vpp_id, vpp_name, vpp_excute_time, vpp_frequenes, vpp_cus_number cus, 'add' opr FROM vedio_plan_patrol
UPDATE vpp_check_record SET vcr_mark=:mark WHERE vcr_vpp_id=:planid AND vcr_vpp_user=:user AND vcr_vpp_excute_time=:excute
